title: Oribe Royal Blowout Heat Styling Spray 5.9oz
description: For the ultimate blowout. This ultra-lightweight mist smoothes even the worst-behaved mop while speeding dry time. It also repairs split ends, nourishes, softens and strengthens the hair, giving it healthy body and shine. Spray on damp hair from mid-shaft to ends; go section by section to blow even straighter.

title: OGX Conditioner, Repairing Awapuhi Ginger, 13oz
description: This exclusive formula repairs brittle, frizzy, unruly hair by penetrating each shaft with moisture. It's the best remedy for repairing, mending and adding silky softness to even the driest, damaged hair.
